WorkItem.Description:
When I try to read a record from an Excel File with Read() method, a "System.SystemException" was unhandled Message="Data de OleAut inv√°lida." I think the cause of the exception there is a field in excel file which is a data type that is not recognized (Date and Time for example), because when I debug the program, I get all the records until the record that exists a Date or Hour field.

Please, I'll apreciate any help, thanks!

Comments.Message:
I'm guessing this must be a localization problem, but I don't have time to debug it right now. If you manage to get it working from the source, please send a patch so we can try and incorporate it.

Cheers
